meanings.definition: (of a horse) to make a series of high-pitched sounds
meanings.sent1: The horse whinnied loudly in the field.
meanings.sent2: Yesterday, the horse whinnied when it saw its favorite rider.
meanings.sent3: As the horse whinnied, the other animals in the barn seemed amused.
meanings.sent4: The wind whinnied through the trees, mimicking the horse's call.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the horse whinnying echoed across the valley.
